result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael Kevin Jones

records.addlTxt: 2:14 PM Attorney Joseph M. Schieffer in Court for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Michael Kevin Jones in Court.  Attorney Alex Stormont in Court for Michael Kevin Jones.  Court advises of rights and possible penalties.  Further reading waived.  NG pleas entered.  Bond continues.  Court questions Defendant's address and phone.  Adjourned at 2:18 PM

2:10 PM Attorney Joseph M. Schieffer in Court for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Michael Kevin Jones in Court.  Attorney Alex Stormont in Court for Michael Kevin Jones.  Set for Preliminary Hearing at 4:00 PM.  Atty. Stormont requested earlier hearing and presents Waiver.  No objection from ADA Schieffer, noting subpoena.  Court advises Defendant of rights.  Court finds Defendant freely, intelligently and knowingly waives constitutional right to a Preliminary Hearing.  Court finds probable cause and binds Defendant over for further proceedings.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Pre-trial conference on November 7, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

4:03 PM  Defendant Michael Kevin Jones not in Court.  Attorney Alex Stormont in Court for Michael Kevin Jones.  ADA Joseph M. Schieffer in Court for State of Wisconsin.  Set for Preliminary Hearing.  ADA Schieffer advises he does not have an Officer and Defendant is not present, attorneys are requesting rescheduling.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 04:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on October 7, 2022 at 04:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on September 16, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

Court will reset a STC. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 2:11 pm.  Status conference scheduled for July 25, 2022 at 01:45 pm.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant to maintain Absolute Sobriety.
Not to possess controlled substances without a valid prescription.
Def from PCJ

3:23 PM Defendant Michael Kevin Jones appears in custody from Jail via video, Atty Derek Sanders by phone, ADA Kaley Walker appears for the State of Wisconsin.  Court informs Defendant of charges, and possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Waives reading. Court reviews DE's rights. ADA Walker is requesting a $10,000.00 SIBS w/conditions of AS & Not to Possess, no objection. Court so orders.  DE does not qualify for PD. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 3:30 pm.  Status conference scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
